location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Sketch map of the Arabian coast between Al Katif and Ras Jibsk

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink with wash on paperDimensions:395 x 730 mmFoliation:The map has been foliated in the top right hand corner with a pencil number enclosed in a circle.

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Relief shown by shading and spot heights.Hand drawn sketch map showing the Arabian coast of the Persian Gulf between Al Katif and Ras Jibsk. Notations concerning the topography of the region cover the face of the map with graticule lines with degrees of latitude inserted in pencil.
